GeoFriend is an application used to discover your local and surrounding areas. GeoFriend uses Android Location Permissions and Android Background Location Permissions to determine whether or not a user is within range of a Landmark. GeoFriend also uses FireBase Authentication to provide a more individualized experience by saving user data using Cloud FireStore. GeoFriend does not intend to use the collected information for any malpurpose or redistribution. 
Please see in-app Privacy Policy for more information.
By clicking below, you accept the terms of use and assume responsibility to safely and responsibly enjoy the application within the limits of the law.

Note: GeoFriend Applications does not in any way support trespassing or usage in traffic.
